div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 59px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Client GRPC Agent
- API specific transformation
- individual worker per client connection

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 348px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 413px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Bundle Storage Agent
- Persists Bundles across restarts
- Can give out bundles to workers according to some criteria
- Tracks bundles that are being worked on

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 44px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Client Agent
- tracks connected and listening clients
- forwards requests to appropriate agents
- forwards bundles to clients

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 468px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Bundle Protocol Agent
- tries to move bundles to their destination
- individual workers per request
- knows the endpoint of the local node
- regularly deletes bundles over lifetime

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 250px; margin-left: 418px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Convergance Agent
- tracks connected other nodes
- forwards incoming bundles between BPA and other nodes
- requests connection to other nodes if desired

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 227px; height: 1px; padding-top: 350px; margin-left: 474px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
TCPCL Agent
- connects to other nodes via TCPCL
- individual worker per client connection

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 243px; height: 1px; padding-top: 260px; margin-left: 47px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Routing Agent
- tracks current and future routes
- answers routing questions

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 243px; height: 1px; padding-top: 370px; margin-left: 9px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Nodes Agent
- tracks node connection methods
- tracks planned node reachability
- regularly tries connetion to expected nodes

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
